problem_text_cn: 如图,延长直角△ABC的斜边AB到点D,使BD=AB,连接CD,若cot∠BCD=3,则tan∠A的值是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, extend the hypotenuse AB of the right angle △ABC to point D, make BD = AB, connect CD, if cot∠BCD = N_0, then the value of tan∠A is ()
raw_answer: 解:如图:做DE⊥AC于E,那么BC∥DE,△ABC∽△ADE．∴\frac{AB}{AD}=\frac{AC}{AE},即\frac{AB}{AB+BD}=\frac{AC}{AC+CE}．又由AB=BD,因此AC=CE．根据BC⊥AC,∠BCE=90°,tan∠DCE=cot∠EDC=cot∠BCD=3,直角三角形DCE中,tan∠DCE=\frac{DE}{CE}=3．直角三角形ADE中,tan∠A=\frac{DE}{AE}=\frac{DE}{2CE}=\frac{3}{2}．故选:D．
